metadata.title: CVE-2022-43272 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
DCMTK v3.6.7 was discovered to contain a memory leak via the T_ASC_Association object.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-43272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dcmtk - 3.6.7-6ubuntu0.1
libdcmtk17 - 3.6.7-6ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.7-6ubuntu0.1').
